name: No Pain No Gain
description:
No Pain No Gain is a time managing shooter game.
With a feel of tower defense and arcade.

Made by:
Cursor Studios
Code: Albin Haglund @Hagge
3D art: Hannes Karlkvist @Dhialga
3D art: Theo Fredsberg @Theoq
Music: Emil Rosenkvist @Embro0404

Instructions:
Defend the gem using your turrets.
Move using WASD

The turrets power comes from your health.
Your health is displayed by the color of the lamp on your suit.

Use the gem to heal when you are low on health
